Caption: A section of the audience at the second convocation of IIT Madras, held at the Open Air Theatre (OAT)
Description: Seated in first row (L to R): Registrar C.V. Sethunathan and Deputy Registrar Rajagopalan. Fourth from right in first row is Shanti Sengupto, wife of Director B. Sengupto. One can also spot Rev. Father Murphy, Professor at Loyola College, seated in the audience. To the right side of the picture, a few German professors with their families are seated. On that day in his address, Chief Guest Mr. M.C. Chagla called the Convocation “one of the most imposing convocations I have ever addressed.”
